name: Through Kippy's Eye
description:
Through Kippy's Eye is a puzzle platformer centered around Kippy, a robot capable of transforming into objects

  • Take over various objects with different properties!
  • Explore intricate levels!
  • Solve intriguing puzzles!

Take on an adventure through a beautiful and relaxing low poly world and help Kippy get home! And remember

You are the Key 

Beegun Team

Joan Mesalles Campos - Game/Level designer and Composer   

Sara Yang - Programmer and UI artist    

Antonio Prieto Vera - Technical Artist   

Jose Ubaldo Grabusqui Rojas - Back-End Programmer   

Collaborators

María Andrés González - Space ship 3D Artist

Controls
  • Left joystick to move
  • Right joystic to change camera angle
  • X(PSN)/A(XBOX) to jump out of objects / Interact
  • Options(PSN)/Pause(XBOX) to show options menu

At this moment the controls are not adapted for keyboard and mouse. It is doable but not recomended

  • WASD to move
  • Q and E to change camera angle
  • Space to jump out of objects/ Interact
  • ESC to show the options menu
